sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const InitialHomePage = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false); const handleSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Navigate to products page with search query navigate(`/products?search=${encodeURIComponent(searchQuery)}`); }; const handleLogin = () => { navigate('/login'); }; const handleSignup = () => { navigate('/register/customer'); }; const navigationItems = [ { name: 'Home', path: '/', icon: '🏠' }, { name: 'Products', path: '/products', icon: '🛍️' }, { name: 'Services', path: '/services', icon: '🔧' }, { name: 'Branches', path: '/branches', icon: '📍' }, { name: 'About', path: '/about', icon: 'ℹ️' }, { name: 'Contact', path: '/contact', icon: '📞' } ]; return (
{/* Header with Login Button */}
{/* Logo */}
A
AquaLink
{/* Desktop Navigation */}
{navigationItems.map((item) => ( {item.icon} {item.name} ))}
{/* Right side - Login Button */}
{/* Mobile menu button */}
{/* Mobile Navigation */}
{navigationItems.map((item) => ( setMenuOpen(false)} > {item.icon} {item.name} ))} {/* Mobile Login/Signup */}
{/* Main Content with top padding for fixed navbar */}
{/* Hero Section */}

Premium Water Solutions

Discover the purest drinking water and advanced filtration systems for your home and business

Shop Now Our Services
{/* Product Slider */}

Featured Products

💧

RO Filters

Advanced reverse osmosis systems for the purest water

View Products
🔧

Spare Parts

High-quality replacement parts for your filtration systems

View Products
🥤

Water Bottles

Premium drinking water in various sizes (5L, 10L, 20L)

View Products
{/* Services Section */}

Our Services

🚰

Water Supply

Reliable delivery of premium drinking water to your doorstep

🔧

Installation

Professional installation and maintenance of water filtration systems

♻️

Recycling

Environmentally responsible water bottle recycling program

{/* Call to Action Section */}

Ready to Get Started?

Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust AquaLink for their water needs

{/* Already have an account section */}

Already have an account?

Sign in to access your dashboard, cart, and profile
{/* Footer */}

AquaLink

Your trusted partner for premium water solutions and sustainable practices.

Quick Links

  • Products
  • Services
  • Branches
  • About Us

Contact

  • 📧 info@aqualink.com
  • 📞 +94 11 234 5678
  • 📍 Colombo, Sri Lanka

Follow Us

Facebook Instagram Twitter

© 2024 AquaLink. All rights reserved.

); }; export default InitialHomePage;
